Hero/Intro section: Interactive elements
  • « Portfolio

Features

  • Blobs:
    • Draggable
    • Blur into one another
    • Changeable color
    • Changeable size
    • Cloneable
    • Removable
  • Layers: (New!)
    • Blobs can be organized into layers, found at the bottom of the container. Choose a layer by clicking the button, and toggle layer visibility by clicking the button of the active layer.
    • Change the layer of the focused blob by pressing the number corresponding to the layer
    • Click the layer buttons and then a blob in order to move the blob up or down a layer
    • Move every blob up or down one layer by pressing the buttons
  • Saving...: (New!)
    • Login to save blobs to server
    • Many versions
    • Name your artwork
    • Rename your art
    • Edit your artwork
  • Screenshot:(New!)
    • Press the camera symbol to take a screenshot
    • Places the image down below
    • Download your artwork (Button)
    • You can change the dimensions of the screenshot by resizing your browser window
  • Sliders to control background:
    • Lightness
    • Saturation
    • Hue
  • Buttons to:
    • Toggle the subtle movement of the blobs
    • Reset the blob array to a new configuration
    • Stop scrolling behavior to use the mouse wheel freely
    • Move view in different directions
    • Toggle control visibility
    • Make a random blob by clicking the plus sign. More colors available: Over a thousand possible color combinations!
  • Which blob is currently active can be seen at the top left of the container
  • On touchscreens, tap the blob twice to shrink it and thrice to enlarge it

Instructions

Pointer use

  • Change blob color by dragging to a color node on the sides
  • Change blob size by dragging it to either the shrink or enlarge symbols on the right hand side
  • Change blob size by scrolling with the mouse wheel (note: you may want to disable scrolling first with the button on the top right)
  • Clone a blob by clicking the top left copy sign and then the blob. Remember to disable the button when finished!
  • Remove a blob by clicking the bottom left x sign and then the blob. Remember to disable the button when finished!
  • Click the layer buttons and then a blob in order to move the blob up or down a layer
  • Keys may be used while the mouse is pressed down on a blob

Keyboard use

  • Tab to a blob, and with it in focus:
    • Press Enter to cycle through the different colors
    • Make blob smaller by pressing S
    • Make blob larger by pressing B or L
    • Clone a blob by pressing C or D
    • Make a new random blob by pressing +
    • Remove a blob by pressing Delete or -
    • Change the layer of the focused blob by pressing the number corresponding to the layer
    • Move blob to bottom by pressing Z or to top by pressing T
    • Press Space or R with a blob in focus to cycle through random colors: Over a thousand possible color combinations!

Tips and tricks

  • If you need to set a blob near the edge of the screen, you may hide the controls by pressing the Hide controls button. You may also move the entire view with the angle quotation mark buttons
  • You may change blob size with the mouse wheel, by disabling the scroll by pressing the Disable Scroll button. Press the button again or Escape to enable scroll again
  • You may use keyboard shortcuts while the mouse is pressed down on a blob
  • More colors are available through the random blob button: the plus sign at the top middle of the screen. Over a thousand possible color combinations! You may clone a rare color blob by pressing C or D with it in focus
  • You can change the dimensions of the screenshot by resizing your browser window
  • If a blob you clicked hides another, you may place the blob back to the bottom of the pile by pressing Z
  • Register and log in to save your artwork to the server and never lose it again
